title: 20 Perches Land in Udabowala
details:
Sell for an immediate cash requirement.
20 Perches bare land within Kandy city limit
1.5 Km to the Peradeniya Kandy main road
Near by Kandy & Peradeniya hospitals, Peradeniya University, Royal mall complex, Upcoming Asiri Hospital.
Suitable for a residential house or for a holiday bungalow.
